SEARCH
Package GameScene

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
GameScene.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Manages the game state, including player turns, card interactions, task execution, and game setup.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameManager(GameScene gameScene, javafx.scene.control.TextArea playerActionLog, javafx.scene.control.TextArea opponentActionLog)
    Constructs a new GameManager with the specified GameScene and action logs for players.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(GameScene gameScene, javafx.scene.control.TextArea playerActionLog, javafx.scene.control.TextArea opponentActionLog)
      Constructs a new GameManager with the specified GameScene and action logs for players.
      Parameters:
      gameScene - The GameScene associated with this GameManager.
      playerActionLog - The action log for the player.
      opponentActionLog - The action log for the opponent.

      Notifies all registered observers of a game event.
      Parameters:

      playerType - The type of player associated with the event.

    • drawCardForPlayer

      public void drawCardForPlayer(Player toWhom, Board whoseBoard)
      Draws a card for a player and notifies observers of the action.
      Parameters:
      toWhom - The player to draw a card for.
      whoseBoard - The board associated with the player.

    • executeAttack

      public void executeAttack(CardView attacker, CardView target)
      Executes an attack between two cards and notifies observers of the action.
      Parameters:
      attacker - The attacking card.
      target - The target card.

    • updateMana

      public void updateMana()
      Updates mana labels in the game scene.

    • clickedOnHand

      public void clickedOnHand(CardView cardView, Player whichPlayer, Board whoseBoard, int mana)
      Handles the action when a player clicks on a card in their hand. Executes the PlayCardCommand and notifies observers accordingly.
      Parameters:
      cardView - The card view clicked by the player.
      whichPlayer - The player who clicked on the card.
      whoseBoard - The board associated with the player.
      mana - The current mana of the player.

    • clickedOnPlayer

      public void clickedOnPlayer(Player attackingPlayer, Player defendingPlayer, Board attackingBoard)
      Handles the action when a player clicks on the opponent player. Executes the AttackPlayerCommand if a card is selected for attack, and notifies observers of the action.
      Parameters:
      attackingPlayer - The player initiating the attack.
      defendingPlayer - The player being attacked.
      attackingBoard - The board associated with the attacking player.

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      Sets up the initial game state, including preparing decks and drawing initial cards.

    • restoringValues

      public void restoringValues(Board playerBoard, Board opponentBoard)
      Restores values of cards on both player and opponent boards.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The player's board.
      opponentBoard - The opponent's board.

    • drawInitialCards

      public void drawInitialCards()
      Draws initial cards for both players at the start of the game. This method ensures that each player receives a predefined number of initial cards from their respective decks. The card drawing process is executed five times for each player, using a lambda expression within a stream for concise iteration.

    • setupCardInteraction

      public void setupCardInteraction(CardView cardView)
      Sets up interaction for a selected card.
      Parameters:
      cardView - The selected card view.

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(CardView cardView)
      Selects a card for an action.
      Parameters:
      cardView - The selected card view.
